body:
I figured it out.

1. The Makefile was wrong which I fixed with the following CMakeLists.txt

```
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.1 FATAL_ERROR)
project(mnist)

find_package(Torch REQUIRED)
find_package(OpenCV REQUIRED)

message(STATUS "CVINCLUDE: ${OpenCV_INCLUDE_DIRS}")
include_directories(${OpenCV_INCLUDE_DIRS})
add_executable(example-app example-app.cpp)
target_link_libraries(example-app  ${TORCH_LIBRARIES} ${OpenCV_LIBS})
set_property(TARGET example-app PROPERTY CXX_STANDARD 11)
```

2. The cmake -DCMAKE_PREFIX_PATH was missing:
```
cmake -DCMAKE_PREFIX_PATH=/home/martin/Dev/pytorch ..
```
